title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: $STG crypto implies the native token of Stargate Finance, a yield farming, cross-chain bridge with over 400 million USD in Total Value Locked (TVL).Since the latest update, it has brought voting power to Stargate DAOâ€™s participants as the governance token.There was no IDO, but an auction closed on March 18, 2022 at the price of $0.25/token.The auction will be 1-year full lockup, 6 month linear unlock thereafter.In fact, a large portion of the auction was acquired by the Alameda Research team from FTX exchange.Learn more about $STG crypto in our aricle
